title: Discovery - penicillin
creator_credit: Dennis Rich and British Information Services
brief_description: An outline history of the discovery of penicillin by Sir Alexander Fleming and its development as a human drug by Sir Howard Florey and Dr E.B. Chain. Uses archival footage and animated graphics.
